summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 2.4°C) and outside temperature (down 1.7°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 749 m) and light levels (up 10078 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 12128 lux), cloud levels (up 1447 m), feels like temperature (up 4.4°C), and outside temperature (up 3.3°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; mild temperatures are expected. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced. A few light raindrops may fall, occasional overcast conditions, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Changeable conditions.
